title: ID a typeface of an old logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mn60_6218.jpg)

I want to ID this typeface (or a similar one). Is from a former Chilean version of the news program _60 minutes_.

 [‹ Cyrillic Asian italic glyph forms](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060211/http:/typophile.com/node/37954 "Go to previous forum topic") [can someone please critique me ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060211/http:/typophile.com/node/37419 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Peroyomas
